title: UK: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle excluded from royal Christmas celebrations
content: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are excluded from the British royal family's Christmas at Sandringham, a tradition they've avoided since 2018. Relations remain tense, particularly between Harry and King Charles, with recent attempts at communication going unanswered. The duo has typically spent holidays in the US since stepping back from royal duties in 2020.
summary: Prince Harry and Meghan Markle are excluded from the British royal family's Christmas at Sandringham, a tradition they've avoided since 2018. Relations remain tense, particularly between Harry and King Charles, with recent attempts at communication going unanswered. The duo has typically spent holidays in the US since stepping back from royal duties in 2020.

title: Trump nominates Charles Kushner as US ambassador to France
content: President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Charles Kushner, father of his son-in-law Jared Kushner, as the next US ambassador to France. Trump praised Kushner's business acumen and leadership, highlighting his achievements with Kushner Companies and past contributions on various boards and councils.
summary: President-elect Donald Trump has nominated Charles Kushner, father of his son-in-law Jared Kushner, as the next US ambassador to France. Trump praised Kushner's business acumen and leadership, highlighting his achievements with Kushner Companies and past contributions on various boards and councils.

title: 'Mar-a-Lago Face': Laura Loomer denies claims of cosmetic surgery
content: A controversy has erupted over the 'Mar-a-Lago face' trend after Laura Loomer accused DailyMail of photoshopping her image. The trend refers to the cosmetic enhancements among Trump’s inner circle. Experts suggest many Trump associates have undergone various aesthetic treatments, sparking debates about altered appearances in political figures.
summary: A controversy has erupted over the 'Mar-a-Lago face' trend after Laura Loomer accused DailyMail of photoshopping her image. The trend refers to the cosmetic enhancements among Trump’s inner circle. Experts suggest many Trump associates have undergone various aesthetic treatments, sparking debates about altered appearances in political figures.

title: Did Trump make Trudeau spend the night at a hotel? Here's the truth behind viral X post
content: An X post that claimed that Donald Trump did not ask Justin Trudeau to stay at Mar-a-Lago at night after their dinner went viral with social media users from both the US and Canada dissing Trudeau. It's true that Trudeau was seen leaving a Florida hotel on Saturday morning after his dinner with Trump, but it was an official visit with a number of Canadian govt officials and the claim of the viral post can not be established.
summary: An X post that claimed that Donald Trump did not ask Justin Trudeau to stay at Mar-a-Lago at night after their dinner went viral with social media users from both the US and Canada dissing Trudeau.  It's true that Trudeau was seen leaving a Florida hotel on Saturday morning after his dinner with Trump, but it was an official visit with a number of Canadian govt officials and the claim of the viral post can not be established.

title: Trump threatens 100% tariffs on Brics nations over plans to replace US Dollar
content: US President-elect Donald Trump has threatened 100 per cent tariffs on Brics nations and allies if they support a new currency to replace the dollar in international trade. Trump demanded a commitment from Brics countries, including new members such as Iran and the UAE, not to challenge the dollar's dominance or face losing access to the US economy.
summary: US President-elect Donald Trump has threatened 100 per cent tariffs on Brics nations and allies if they support a new currency to replace the dollar in international trade. Trump demanded a commitment from Brics countries, including new members such as Iran and the UAE, not to challenge the dollar's dominance or face losing access to the US economy.

title: Trump says meeting with Trudeau was very productive: 'I made it very clear that...'
content: Donald Trump described his meeting with Justin Trudeau as very productive while Trudeau said he had an excellent conversation with Trump. Trudeau flew down to Florida to meet Trump after the President-elect announced he would impose a 25 per cent tax on imports from Canada and Mexico unless they address the drugs and illegal immigrants issue.
summary: Donald Trump described his meeting with Justin Trudeau as very productive while Trudeau said he had an excellent conversation with Trump. Trudeau flew down to Florida to meet Trump after the President-elect announced he would impose a 25 per cent tax on imports from Canada and Mexico unless they address the drugs and illegal immigrants issue.

title: World Central Kitchen says pausing Gaza operations after Israeli strike
Ellen DeGeneres' England farmhouse hit by floods days after she left US following Trump's win
content: Ellen DeGeneres and Portia De Rossi’s new Cotswolds retreat faces severe flooding just days after their relocation from California. Their multi-million-pound estate was swamped following a nearby tributary's overflow. Storm Bert's torrential rains and 80mph winds caused significant damage, rendering surrounding roads impassable. Their move was reportedly a protest against Donald Trump's election.
summary: Ellen DeGeneres and Portia De Rossi’s new Cotswolds retreat faces severe flooding just days after their relocation from California. Their multi-million-pound estate was swamped following a nearby tributary's overflow. Storm Bert's torrential rains and 80mph winds caused significant damage, rendering surrounding roads impassable. Their move was reportedly a protest against Donald Trump's election.

title: Vivek Ramaswamy, Elon Musk fume that Melania and Barron Trump were 'debanked' once
content: ​The co-chiefs of the Department of Government Efficiency Elon Musk and Vivek Ramaswamy reacted to a screenshot of Melania's account and said it was farcical, crazy. "This is getting farcical," Vivek posted. "Crazy", "This is beyond insane," Elon Musk wrote. ​Both the co-chiefs reacting to what a bank did to Melania and Barron after Trump lost the election could mean that some action could be taken against the bank, which Melania did not name in her memoir. But it won't be hard either to find the bank.

title: Meet San Jose State volleyball star Blaire Fleming, who ignited controversy over transgender athlete participation
content: Blaire Fleming, a talented San Jose State volleyball player, has sparked national debate on transgender athletes in women's sports. Despite leading her team to the Mountain West tournament final, her inclusion has faced criticism and legal challenges from teammates and opponents, citing unfair physical advantages. Investigations found insufficient evidence to support these claims.
summary: Blaire Fleming, a talented San Jose State volleyball player, has sparked national debate on transgender athletes in women's sports. Despite leading her team to the Mountain West tournament final, her inclusion has faced criticism and legal challenges from teammates and opponents, citing unfair physical advantages. Investigations found insufficient evidence to support these claims.

title: RFK jr appears naked taking a shower in Cheryl Hines' video: 'Grifting weirdos'
content: ​Donald Trump's health secretary of the incoming administration appeared taking a shower in an Instagram live of his wife where she was announcing discounts on her beauty products. Hines pretended that it was not all planned and acted surprised asking for a minute for her video. “You can’t take a shower, I’m doing a video! No, no, no, I’m doing a… you’ve gotta give me a second I’m doing a video for Hines+Young. Honey… 60% off,” Hines said.
summary: ​Donald Trump's health secretary of the incoming administration appeared taking a shower in an Instagram live of his wife where she was announcing discounts on her beauty products. Hines pretended that it was not all planned and acted surprised asking for a minute for her video. “You can’t take a shower, I’m doing a video! No, no, no, I’m doing a… you’ve gotta give me a second I’m doing a video for Hines+Young. Honey… 60% off,” Hines said.

title: Why Bushra Bibi rejected Imran Khan's agreement to move protest venue
content: Pakistan's defence minister Khawaja Asif said former PM Imran Khan agreed to move a protest outside Islamabad. However, his wife, Bushra Bibi, refused, resulting in violent clashes and several casualties. The government formed an anti-riot force, accusing PTI of misinformation and old or AI-generated images.
summary: Pakistan's defence minister Khawaja Asif said former PM Imran Khan agreed to move a protest outside Islamabad. However, his wife, Bushra Bibi, refused, resulting in violent clashes and several casualties. The government formed an anti-riot force, accusing PTI of misinformation and old or AI-generated images.

title: Vindman's accusation and Elon Musk's 'will pay price' threat: Here's what happened
content: Retired Army Lt Col Alexander Vindman clashed with Elon Musk after calling Musk out for leaking state secrets to Russian president Putin. In response, Musk accused Vindman of treason and being on the payroll of Ukrainian oligarchs. Vindman defended himself, stating Musk's accusations were unfounded and motivated by a desire to silence critics.
summary: Retired Army Lt Col Alexander Vindman clashed with Elon Musk after calling Musk out for leaking state secrets to Russian president Putin. In response, Musk accused Vindman of treason and being on the payroll of Ukrainian oligarchs. Vindman defended himself, stating Musk's accusations were unfounded and motivated by a desire to silence critics.

title: 'Relations with India changed after Hasina's ouster': Bangladesh foreign adviser
Myanmar navy fires at Thai fishing boats, detains 31 fishermen, Thailand says
content: Myanmar's navy fired on Thai fishing vessels, resulting in one fisherman drowning and the detention of 31 crew members. The incident occurred after two boats strayed into Myanmar's waters. Thai authorities are negotiating for their release and assessing potential violations of international law. The Thai foreign ministry and the Myanmar junta have been involved in addressing the situation.
summary: Myanmar's navy fired on Thai fishing vessels, resulting in one fisherman drowning and the detention of 31 crew members. The incident occurred after two boats strayed into Myanmar's waters. Thai authorities are negotiating for their release and assessing potential violations of international law. The Thai foreign ministry and the Myanmar junta have been involved in addressing the situation.

title: Real reason why Harry and Meghan professionally separated, German filmmaker reveals
content: Harry and Meghan's Archewell Foundation was doomed to fail, reveals the German director of a bombshell documentary, as the ex-royals worked only an hour per week for the foundation. The donations dwindled in one year and their ambition to become global benefactors bringing about tangible changes came crashing down forcing them to choose separate paths professionally.
summary: Harry and Meghan's Archewell Foundation was doomed to fail, reveals the German director of a bombshell documentary, as the ex-royals worked only an hour per week for the foundation. The donations dwindled in one year and their ambition to become global benefactors bringing about tangible changes came crashing down forcing them to choose separate paths professionally.

title: Diddy dangled me off 17th floor balcony, slammed into furniture: Designer's explosive claim
content: Fashion designer Bryana Bana Bongolan has filed a $10 million lawsuit against Sean Diddy, alleging sexual battery, emotional distress, and false imprisonment. Bongolan claims Diddy threatened to kill her, physically assaulted her, and terrorized her during their association. She witnessed Diddy's abusive behavior towards his girlfriend, Cassie Ventura, and endured direct threats from him.
summary: Fashion designer Bryana Bana Bongolan has filed a $10 million lawsuit against Sean Diddy, alleging sexual battery, emotional distress, and false imprisonment. Bongolan claims Diddy threatened to kill her, physically assaulted her, and terrorized her during their association. She witnessed Diddy's abusive behavior towards his girlfriend, Cassie Ventura, and endured direct threats from him.

title: Old video of Trudeau mocking Trump viral as Canada PM dines with President-elect
content: A 2019 video of Justin Trudeau mocking Donald Trump has gone viral as the Canadian PM flew to Florida to meet President-elect Trump following Trump's tariff threat. ​In the footage, Trudeau, Boris Johnson, Emmanuel Macron were in a huddle at a function at Buckingham Palace. Johnson asked Macron: "Is that why he was late?" to which Trudeau said: "He was late because he talked a 40-minute press conference off the top".
summary: A 2019 video of Justin Trudeau mocking Donald Trump has gone viral as the Canadian PM  flew to Florida to meet President-elect Trump following Trump's tariff threat. ​In the footage, Trudeau, Boris Johnson, Emmanuel Macron were in a huddle at a function at Buckingham Palace. Johnson asked Macron: "Is that why he was late?" to which Trudeau said: "He was late because he talked a 40-minute press conference off the top".

title: 'He wasn't sorry': 72-year-old shot dead in Florida over loud music dispute
content: A 72-year-old man, Hurleyeon McLean, was shot and killed by his neighbor in Florida's Somerset Drive apartments following a disagreement over loud music. McLean went to speak with the neighbor after a noise complaint, leading to an altercation where McLean was fatally shot. The neighbor also threatened McLean's wife.
summary: A 72-year-old man, Hurleyeon McLean, was shot and killed by his neighbor in Florida's Somerset Drive apartments following a disagreement over loud music. McLean went to speak with the neighbor after a noise complaint, leading to an altercation where McLean was fatally shot. The neighbor also threatened McLean's wife.

title: Tragic murder-suicide: Model kills husband before taking her own life in luxury Florida home
content: In a tragic incident at their Florida high-rise condo, model Sabrina Krasniqi, 27, reportedly shot her husband, Pajtim Krasniqi, 34, multiple times before taking her own life. The bodies were discovered early Wednesday morning on the balcony. A gunfire detection system recorded six shots. The motive remains unclear as police continue their investigation.
summary: In a tragic incident at their Florida high-rise condo, model Sabrina Krasniqi, 27, reportedly shot her husband, Pajtim Krasniqi, 34, multiple times before taking her own life. The bodies were discovered early Wednesday morning on the balcony. A gunfire detection system recorded six shots. The motive remains unclear as police continue their investigation.
